metric.name: clientOpFailures
metric.description: Total number of clientOp attempts that have failed

metric.name: clientOpSendFailures
metric.description: Total number of clientOp sends that have failed

metric.name: clientOpSendTime
metric.description: Total amount of time, in nanoseconds spent doing clientOp sends

metric.name: clientOpSends
metric.description: Total number of clientOp sends that have completed successfully

metric.name: clientOpSendsInProgress
metric.description: Current number of clientOp sends being executed

metric.name: clientOpTime
metric.description: Total amount of time, in nanoseconds spent doing clientOps

metric.name: clientOpTimeouts
metric.description: Total number of clientOp attempts that have timed out

metric.name: clientOps
metric.description: Total number of clientOps completed successfully

metric.name: clientOpsInProgress
metric.description: Current number of clientOps being executed

metric.name: connectionWaitTime
metric.description: Total number of nanoseconds spent waiting for a connection.

metric.name: connectionWaits
metric.description: Total number of times a thread completed waiting for a connection (by timing out or by getting a connection).

metric.name: connectionWaitsInProgress
metric.description: Current number of threads waiting for a connection

metric.name: connections
metric.description: Current number of connections

metric.name: connects
metric.description: Total number of times a connection has been created.

metric.name: disconnects
metric.description: Total number of times a connection has been destroyed.

metric.name: idleChecks
metric.description: Total number of checks done for idle expiration.

metric.name: idleDisconnects
metric.description: Total number of disconnects done due to idle expiration.

metric.name: initialContactCount
metric.description: Number of contacts initially by user

metric.name: loadConditioningChecks
metric.description: Total number of checks done for load conditioning expiration.

metric.name: loadConditioningConnects
metric.description: Total number of connects done due to load conditioning.

metric.name: loadConditioningDisconnects
metric.description: Total number of disconnects done due to load conditioning expiration.

metric.name: loadConditioningExtensions
metric.description: Total number of times a connection's load conditioning has been extended because the servers are still balanced.

metric.name: loadConditioningReplaceTimeouts
metric.description: Total number of times a load conditioning connect was done but was not used.

metric.name: locatorRequests
metric.description: Number of requests from this connection pool to a locator

metric.name: locatorResponses
metric.description: Number of responses from the locator to this connection pool

metric.name: locators
metric.description: Current number of locators discovered

metric.name: minPoolSizeConnects
metric.description: Total number of connects done to maintain minimum pool size.

metric.name: poolConnections
metric.description: Current number of pool connections

metric.name: servers
metric.description: Current number of servers discovered

metric.name: subscriptionServers
metric.description: Number of servers hosting this clients subscriptions
